ComicInfo.Summary: Space Cakes, Part 3 of 5: John Colby, Poyo and Caesar team up to free Professor Angus Hinterwald from a terrorist group. Professor Angus Hinterwald had discovered a gene which caused decomposing cattle meat to explode.
